metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6185 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Improper input validation enabling arbitrary Gstreamer pipeline injection

criterions.comment: libreoffice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
